entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'you' in the letter. He is mentioned as needing to send a response back to Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who sent him a letter. He is referred to as 'we' in the letter and is mentioned as coming to get Harry at 5 o'clock on Sunday.

entities.name: pig
entities.description: A pig that Ron mentions in the letter. It seems to be a messenger or a way for Ron to communicate with Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is arriving at his place that afternoon. She is mentioned in the letter as 'Hermione's arriving this afternoon'.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Harry's brother, mentioned in the letter as starting work at the Department of International Magical Cooperation.

relationships.description: Ron sent a letter to Harry, and Harry needs to send a response back to Ron. This is mentioned in the text as 'I need you to take my answer back!'
Ron mentions sending Pig back with Harry's answer, indicating that Pig is a way for Ron to communicate with Harry.
